required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Single-center Prospective Cohort Study for Pure Pulmonary Ground Glass Nodules in Women Preparing for Pregnancy
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center Prospective Cohort Study for Pure Pulmonary Ground Glass Nodules in Women Preparing for Pregnancy

brief_summary.textblock: In this study, about 200 pure GGO in women preparing for pregnancy will be included for a 5-year follow-up. The aim of this study is to elucidate the biological nature of pulmonary GGO lesion in women preparing for pregnancy and provide evidence for GGO treatment.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months, 1year, 2 years, 3 years, 4 years and 5 years

primary_outcome.measure: Changes from baseline GGO CT index.
primary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months, 1year, 2 years, 3 years, 4 years and 5 years
primary_outcome.description: Changes from baseline GGO CT index.

intervention.intervention_name: pure pulmonary ground glass nodules in women preparing for pregnancy
intervention.description: pure pulmonary ground glass nodules in women preparing for pregnancy

study_pop.textblock: pure pulmonary ground glass nodules in women preparing for pregnancy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 20-45 years' old found pulmonary GGO with chest CT scan and CT follow-up after 3 months shows that the GGO remains Diameter of GGO > 5mm and < 3cm
Exclusion Criteria:
- receiving immunosuppressor or steriods receiving chemo- or radio- therapy can not receive regular follow-up
